title: Michigan hires Whittingham as HC on 5-year deal
content: Kyle Whittingham was hired as Michigan's next head football coach, signing a five-year deal, the school said on Friday night.

title: Raiders shut down DE Crosby, who leaves facility
content: The Raiders informed defensive end Maxx Crosby that he will sit out Sunday's matchup against the Giants because of a knee injury. After being told of the decision, Crosby left the team's facility.

title: Lakers' Reaves (calf strain) out at least 1 month
content: Los Angeles Lakers guard Austin Reaves is expected to miss at least a month because of a calf strain, the team announced Friday.

title: Packers rule out Love, will start Willis vs. Ravens
content: Packers quarterback Jordan Love has been ruled out for Saturday's game against the Ravens as he continues to deal with a concussion. Malik Willis will start for Green Bay.

title: Bills' Allen 'good to go' vs. Eagles after foot injury
content: Despite a right foot injury, Buffalo Bills quarterback Josh Allen is set to play in Sunday's game against the Philadelphia Eagles and is not expected to have any limitations, per coach Sean McDermott.

title: Garrett eyes sack record vs. 'legendary' Rodgers
content: Defensive end Myles Garrett says it would be "special" to set the NFL's single-season sack record against "legendary" quarterback Aaron Rodgers when the Browns and Steelers square off Sunday in Cleveland.

title: Pats down 5 starters, but Henderson might play
content: The Patriots will be without five starters against the Jets, but there's still a chance rookie running back TreVeyon Henderson is available as he progresses through concussion protocol.

title: Sources: AD to miss a few games with groin strain
content: Mavericks star Anthony Davis has sustained a minor groin strain and is likely to miss a few games, sources told ESPN's Shams Charania.

title: üèÜ Pop-Tarts Bowl trophy: Behind the scenes
content: How the internet's favorite bowl took things to the next level by making its trophy a kitchen appliance.

content: Here's the latest intel from around the league, including whether Joe Burrow wants out of Cincy and more.

content: ESPN analyst Zach Kram picks two stats for the teams that played on Dec. 25, and breaks down why fans should be happy and worried about their title aspirations.

title: A reason (or two) to watch every one of this year's bowl games
content: With first-year success stories, chances at redemption and general silliness, bowl season always delivers.

title: How to bet Texans-Chargers and Ravens-Packers, plus DFS picks
content: The Texans can clinch a playoff spot against the Chargers, while the Ravens need a win against the Packers. Here are the odds, game picks, prop plays and daily fantasy tips for the games.

title: NBA Power Rankings: Young risers to watch on all 30 teams
content: From ROY and MIP races, our NBA insiders break down all 30 teams' young riser in this week's Power Rankings.

title: Ranking the biggest MLB Christmas week moves
content: Who says the offseason slows down for the holidays? Let's remember some free agent signings and trades.

title: Burrow gifts offensive linemen authentic dinosaur, bear and mammoth fossils for Christmas
content: Burrow's love of fossils gained national acclaim because of a clip from the Netflix series "Quarterback," where he was pumped to see fossils at Chicago's Field Museum.

title: Buzz: Lamar Jackson doubtful for Saturday; Jordan Love ruled out
content: Check your lineups as Lamar Jackson is doubtful to play on Saturday, while Jordan Love has been ruled out.

title: Tracking the NFL playoff picture: Updated chances to clinch open spots, win division titles
content: We are following the 2025 NFL season's playoff picture. Here's how things look right now for wild-card spots, division races and even the draft order.

title: Makeshift Man United scrap to win over Newcastle, offering hope as rough stretch approaches
content: Man United's win over Newcastle on Boxing Day may be Ruben Amorim's most satisfying yet as they overcame a depleted squad.

title: Laurens' weekend preview: Atalanta to test Inter, AFCON pressures Morocco
content: What is Julien Laurens watching this weekend? Inter Milan getting tested by upstart Atalanta, and more action for Africa Cup of Nation hosts Morocco.

title: 36 NFL rookies reveal the one big lesson they learned this season
content: Tyler Shough, Isaac TeSlaa and Jalon Walker were among the 36 rookies who learned how humbling and challenging the NFL can be.

title: 'Mr. Eligible': The growing fraternity of NFL sixth offensive linemen
content: NFL teams are using sixth O-linemen in more plays this season, and we're highlighting, yep -- six of them.

title: The Playbook: Shadow Reports, lineup locks for Christmas Day and all of Week 17
content: An all-encompassing look at the matchups to exploit or avoid and lineup locks in fantasy, as well as projected scores for all NFL games.

title: What's new heading into second season of TGL
content: From signature holes to a bigger and better putting green, the TGL is ready for the start of the 2026 season.

title: World Junior Championship guide: Top contenders, key players to watch
content: The tournament starts Thursday, with the best under-20 players in hockey. Here are gold medal favorites, players set to break out.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United want Gallagher loan, Atl√©tico want ‚Ç¨30m
content: Atl√©tico Madrid midfielder Conor Gallagher is the subject of interest from Manchester United. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: How U.S. Soccer can grow the game with $100 million World Cup windfall
content: The U.S. Soccer Federation is expecting to earn $100 million from co-hosting next summer's World Cup, so how will that money be invested in the game?

title: The 50 best women's soccer players in the world for 2025, ranked!
content: Here are the 50 best women's soccer players in the world for 2025, as ranked by an expert panel of coaches, GMs and journalists.

title: Colton Herta's adaptation to F2 could define IndyCar's global reputation
content: Colton Herta left IndyCar for F2 in hopes of moving up to F1. Whether he succeeds could determine how the world views the American open-wheel series.

title: Russia strikes Kyiv with missiles, drones; message for Trump ahead of Zelenskyy meet?
content: Kyiv was rocked by powerful explosions early Saturday as Russia launched missile and drone attacks across Ukraine. Air defenses were active, with authorities urging residents to seek shelter. This latest assault occurs as President Zelenskyy prepares to meet with US President Donald Trump to discuss a peace proposal aimed at ending the ongoing conflict.

title: Watch: 7k flower pots looted after PM Modi's visit in UP; 30 security personnel deployed
content: Nearly 7,000 potted plants, valued at Rs10 lakh, were looted from the newly inaugurated Rashtra Prerna Sthal within 24 hours. Despite police presence, individuals were seen removing plants and leaving in vehicles. Authorities are now increasing security and relocating remaining plants to prevent further theft.

title: Bangladesh concert attack: Bricks thrown at show of 'Bheegi Bheegi' singer James; 15-20 students injured
content: A concert by Bangladeshi rock star James was cancelled in Faridpur. The event turned violent when outsiders attempted to enter the venue. They threw bricks and stones, injuring at least 25 people, including students. Organisers expressed confusion about the motive behind the attack. The deputy commissioner instructed the cancellation of the performance.

title: Massive! Deepti Sharma smashes records, becomes first Indian cricketer to ...
content: Deepti Sharma achieved a historic milestone in the third T20I against Sri Lanka, becoming the third-highest wicket-taker in women's international cricket and the first Indian to claim 150 T20I wickets. She also became the first cricketer globally to score 1,000 runs and take 150 wickets in T20 Internationals.

title: Between two Indias: Life on the 2025 feed
content: In 2025, the Indian "scroll" is a journey through two worlds on one screen: a filtered India of aesthetic luxury and a raw India of everyday labor. As affordable data and smartphones bring 500 million users online‚Äîmostly from Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities‚Äîthe distance between these lives has collapsed.

title: ‚ÄòEfficiency‚Äô era: Big Tech embraces AI-led cuts; how job security vanished in 2025
content: In 2025, 'efficiency' became the dominant corporate mantra, driving widespread layoffs and hiring freezes across Big Tech and the federal government. Companies are leveraging AI to automate tasks and reduce middle management, aiming for higher profits. This trend was amplified by the public sector's Department of Government Efficiency, which implemented aggressive workforce reductions.

title: 'That Indian side wasn't great': Alastair Cook's brutal take on England's 2-2 series draw
content: Alastair Cook believes England's 2-2 draw against India, led by Shubman Gill, was against a "not a great Indian side." He expressed concern that this result masked underlying issues and potentially diverted focus from crucial series like the Ashes, where England are currently trailing Australia 0-3.

title: 'India should change its stand': Hindus form party in Bangladesh; hope to win 40-45 seats in polls
content: A newly registered Bangladesh Minority Janta Party (BMJP) aims to contest 91 seats in the upcoming elections, targeting Hindu and minority votes. The party's president seeks alliances with mainstream parties like BNP or Jamaat-e-Islami to ensure minority safety and participation, advocating for a secular Bangladesh and protection of Hindu rights.

title: Silver price today: White metal soars 9% to record high; gold, platinum & others follow
content: Silver prices have surged to a record high, outperforming gold with a staggering 158% rise over the past year. This rally, fueled by tight supply, industrial demand, and anticipated Federal Reserve rate cuts, has propelled other precious metals like gold, platinum, and palladium to new peaks. Analysts foresee continued upward momentum, with silver potentially reaching $90 and gold nearing $5,000.

title: Google CEO shares AI-made Xmas photo: Elon Musk reacts; post goes viral
content: Google CEO Sundar Pichai's AI-generated Christmas greeting featuring himself and his dog, Jeffree, in a custom snow globe image, garnered significant attention on X.

title: Border clashes: Thailand and Cambodia agree to 'immediate' ceasefire; second this year
content: Thailand and Cambodia have agreed to an immediate ceasefire, ending weeks of deadly border clashes. The joint statement, effective December 27, 2025, covers all weapon types and targets. This agreement follows intensified violence after a previous ceasefire collapsed, despite earlier US-brokered peace efforts.

title: 'Rs 763 for 28 deliveries': Raghav Chadha invites Blinkit delivery partner for lunch
content: A Blinkit delivery executive, whose viral video exposed meager daily earnings, met Rajya Sabha MP Raghav Chadha. Chadha had previously raised concerns in Parliament about gig worker conditions, including low pay and lack of social security. The delivery partner shared his daily struggles with long hours and unpredictable income.

title: 'Year of tariff consequences': Global trade in 2026 ‚Äî another rough patch ahead?
content: Global trade faces a turbulent 2026 as US tariffs reshape flows, impacting American imports while boosting others. The USMCA faces review, and shipping could see disruption from Red Sea route reopening and potential US economic acceleration. New trade deals lack enforcement, raising concerns about their durability amid international objections.

title: Aadhaar-PAN linking: December 31 deadline, penalty of Rs 1,000; things to know
content: Urgent action is required for all PAN cardholders. The Income Tax Department has set December 31, 2025, as the final deadline to link your PAN with Aadhaar. Failure to comply will render your PAN card inoperative, leading to significant financial penalties and tax implications.  A Rs 1,000 late fee applies for those linking after the initial period.

title: MS Dhoni at Salman Khan birthday party: Fans chant 'Mahi bhai' - Watch
content: Mahendra Singh Dhoni's rare public appearance at Salman Khan's birthday bash highlighted his enduring fan appeal.  Dhoni will return for IPL 2026 with Chennai Super Kings, who invested heavily in uncapped talents like Kartik Sharma. Sharma expressed his excitement about playing alongside Dhoni, calling it a dream come true after a significant auction bid.

title: Mysterious death in Tirupati: Suspended professor found dead in parked car; probe under way
content: A suspended Sri Venkateswara University professor, V Sardar Gugloth, was found dead in a decomposed state inside a parked car near Alipiri. He had been suspended three months prior due to alcohol addiction and irregular attendance. Police are investigating the exact cause of death, suspecting he died several days ago.

title: Delhi air pollution: AQI slips to 'Very Poor' as smog engulfs city; crosses 300 mark
content: Delhi woke up to severe fog and smog on Saturday, with pollution levels reaching dangerous highs in several areas. Calm winds trapped pollutants, worsening air quality to 'Very Poor' and 'Severe' categories. Vehicular emissions and NCR districts were identified as major contributors to the pollution load.

title: Tu Meri Main Tera Main Tera Tu Meri opens to Rs 7.5cr, faces Dhurandhar heat
content: Kartik Aaryan and Ananya Panday's latest film experienced a significant dip on its second day, earning approximately Rs 5 crore. Despite a holiday release, the movie's total collection now stands at Rs 12.75 crore net.

title: Bangladesh unrest: Please save us, open borders - Hindus send SOS from Dhaka
content: Hindus in Bangladesh are pleading with India to open its borders, fearing escalating violence and persecution following recent lynchings.  Concerns are heightened by the potential return of a hardline BNP leader, with minorities feeling trapped and vulnerable.  Activists criticize Indian Hindu organizations for inaction, warning of a potential 'holocaust' if borders remain closed.

title: ‚ÄòFixing the basics‚Äô: New Zealand PM hails free trade agreement with India
content: New Zealand's Prime Minister Christopher Luxon celebrated the newly signed Free Trade Agreement with India, fulfilling a key government promise. This landmark deal, concluding nine months of negotiations, aims to boost jobs, incomes, and exports by opening access to India's vast consumer market.

title: Frank Lampard & Christine Lampard net worth 2025: Football, TV success
content: Former Chelsea star Frank Lampard, a decorated player and manager, has achieved significant success in football. His wife, Christine Lampard, is a highly recognized and versatile TV presenter. Despite their public profiles, the couple prioritizes their children, maintaining a combined net worth estimated at ¬£100 million through their respective careers and investments.

title: Jordan Spieth net worth 2025: How the golf star built his fortune
content: Jordan Spieth, a celebrated American golfer, boasts a remarkable career. He has secured three major championships and the FedEx Cup. Spieth's earnings stem from tournament wins, lucrative brand deals, and sponsorships. He continues to compete actively on the PGA Tour. Off the course, he supports charitable causes through his foundation.

title: ‚ÄòDoesn‚Äôt have anything ‚Äô: Trump casts himself as arbiter of peace deal; sceptical of Zelenskyy's plan
content: US President Donald Trump asserted that any Ukraine-Russia peace deal requires his approval, ahead of talks with Ukrainian President Zelenskyy. Trump expressed skepticism about Zelenskyy's peace proposal, emphasizing his ultimate decision-making power. He anticipates constructive discussions with both Zelenskyy and Putin, while also confirming meetings with Israeli PM Netanyahu.

title: Indigo crisis: ‚ÄòExemplary‚Äô action on airline likely as DGCA tables report
content: Government prepares for strong action against IndiGo after a major schedule collapse.  A DGCA report has been submitted to the civil aviation ministry.  This report details the reasons behind the widespread flight disruptions.  The government aims to ensure IndiGo improves its operations.  Steep fines and regulatory scrutiny are anticipated for the airline and some officials.

title: Brittany Mahomes looks past Chiefs struggles, praises Patrick‚Äôs off-field impact
content: Patrick Mahomes' 15 and the Mahomies Foundation is making a significant community impact, with partner Youth Volunteer Corps reporting over 92,000 volunteer hours and $3.2 million in community benefit. Brittany Mahomes actively supports these efforts, highlighting the foundation's growing influence beyond football.  The foundation's initiatives, like Read for 15 and Volunteer for 15, foster positive development in young people.

title: Why FaZe Clan members exited: Adin Ross reveals ownership fight and rejected deals
content: GameSquare is now the sole owner of FaZe Clan after Richard Bengtsone exited in 2025. Several creators left the group on Christmas eve. Adin Ross claimed the exits happened after GameSquare asked creators to give up 20% stakes late. FaZe Banks denied any role and said he has moved on.

title: On This Day: Ajinkya Rahane‚Äôs century that changed Indian cricket
content: Ajinkya Rahane's century at the Melbourne Cricket Ground on December 27, 2020, was a pivotal moment for Indian Test cricket. Following a humiliating defeat, Rahane's resilient innings, marked by calm determination, restored belief and set the stage for a historic series victory against Australia. His performance showcased his ability to deliver under immense pressure.

title: 'Dhurandhar' BO collection Day 22: Ranveer Singh starrer storms past 1000cr worldwide
content: Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' has shattered box office records, crossing Rs 1000 crore worldwide in just 22 days. The film's impressive run, bolstered by strong overseas collections, makes it the ninth Indian film to achieve this feat and the first of 2025. Despite an 'A' rating, its success is a significant achievement.

title: Slashed 26 times: Kanpur woman axes husband to death after drunken fight
content: A shocking incident unfolded in Kanpur where a woman, Veerangana, allegedly attacked her husband, Ravishankar Savita, with an axe multiple times following a drunken argument. Their young son was present during the brutal altercation. Veerangana was apprehended by authorities after initially reporting an accident. Investigators are continuing their probe into the violent domestic dispute.

title: Travis Kelce reveals Taylor Swift habit that quietly improved his health
content: Travis Kelce shared how his relationship with Taylor Swift has transformed his routines, particularly through their shared love of cooking. Swift's sourdough baking and healthier eating habits have significantly improved Kelce's gut health and overall well-being, showcasing a grounded side of the athlete as they build a life together through simple, shared rituals.

title: Gas geysers pose hidden danger: Neurologist warns of carbon monoxide risk
content: A chilling warning from a Maharashtra neurologist highlights the fatal risks of hot showers in poorly ventilated bathrooms, especially with gas geysers. Two patients fell unconscious due to carbon monoxide poisoning, a silent killer that deprives the brain of oxygen.  Recognize symptoms like headache, dizziness, and confusion to act fast.

title: Acting on 'sixth sense', Supreme Court quashes rape conviction
content: The Supreme Court, guided by a 'sixth sense,' intervened in a rape conviction case. Observing a consensual relationship that soured, the court facilitated a marriage between the convict and victim. Following their union and happy cohabitation, the apex court quashed the 10-year conviction, invoking its powers to deliver complete justice.

title: Only 14! Vaibhav Suryavanshi meets PM Narendra Modi; pic goes viral
content: Vaibhav Sooryavanshi, a young cricketer, made headlines in the past year. He received the Pradhan Mantri Rashtriya Bal Puraskar, India's highest civilian honor for young achievers. Sooryavanshi broke several cricket records, including the youngest player to score a century in List A cricket. He also achieved a T20 century at a young age.

title: Top 10 extreme weather events cost world more than $122bn in 2025: Report
content: Extreme weather events in 2025 inflicted over $122 billion in global damages, with India and Pakistan's devastating monsoon floods alone costing $5.6 billion and claiming 1,860 lives. While the US faced the highest financial toll from wildfires, poorer nations bore a disproportionate human cost. Experts warn continued fossil fuel use fuels this escalating crisis.

title: Fans hail LeBron James as 'GOAT father' after gifting daughter a mini house
content: NBA legend LeBron James recently delighted fans with a viral throwback video of his daughter, Zhuri Nova James, enjoying a custom-built mini mansion he once gifted her for her birthday. The thoughtful gift, mirroring their own home, showcased James's loving fatherhood and his ability to balance a legendary career with family life. Fans praised the sweet gesture, highlighting the strong bond between the father and the daughter.

title: Uttar Pradesh: 19% voters 'uncollectable' as SIR enumeration ends
content: Uttar Pradesh faces a significant challenge with 2.89 crore voters deemed 'uncollectable' during a special revision. This includes those who have shifted, passed away, or are untraceable. Lucknow alone saw 12 lakh voters uncollectable. The state aims for a clean electoral roll by February 2026, with draft lists due December 31, 2025.

title: Himachal Pradesh: Doctors launch indefinite strike after colleague sacked over assault
content: Resident doctors in Himachal Pradesh have launched an indefinite strike, demanding the reinstatement of a doctor sacked for assaulting a patient. Despite a promise of a fresh inquiry, doctors deem the termination unjust, citing a lack of consideration for the doctor's perspective. The protest has disrupted routine medical services across the state.

title: ‚ÄòVendetta‚Äô: Delhi HC scraps CISF officer‚Äôs forced retirement
content: After two decades of battling a tarnished reputation, a 72-year-old retired CISF officer has won a decisive victory, as the Delhi High Court exonerates him from long-standing sexual harassment allegations.

title: PM Rashtriya Bal Puraskar: From Sindoor to sports - stories of valour in the spotlight
content: President Murmu honored 20 young achievers with the Pradhan Mantri Rashtriya Bal Puraskar for their bravery, social service, and talent. Stories like Shavan Singh's support for soldiers and Vansh Tayal's care for an abandoned child highlight remarkable courage and compassion. The awards celebrated exceptional achievements across various fields, inspiring a nation.

title: Hindus form party in Bangladesh; prepare to fight upcoming polls
content: Amidst persecution, Bangladesh Minority Janta Party (BMJP) is set to contest 91 seats in the upcoming polls, targeting Hindu and minority votes. The party president seeks alliances with mainstream parties like BNP to ensure minority safety and urges India to shift its support from Awami League to champion the cause of persecuted Hindus.

title: Amit Shah calls for creation of ‚Äòanti-terrorism grid‚Äô; urges common ATS
content: Union home minister Amit Shah has called for a nationwide upgrade of anti-terror infrastructure, advocating for an "impenetrable anti-terrorism grid" and a common ATS structure across states. He also announced a "360-degree strike" plan against organised crime, emphasizing data sharing and technological integration to combat evolving threats and ensure future security.

title: Unnao rape case: CBI moves Supreme Court against Delhi high court order
content: The CBI has approached the Supreme Court seeking a stay on the Delhi high court's order suspending the sentence of expelled BJP MLA Kuldeep Singh Sengar in the Unnao rape case. The High Court had ruled that Sengar, convicted for raping a minor, was wrongly classified as a public servant.

title: Uttar Pradesh: Hauled up for using AI during exam, girl dies by suicide
content: A Class 10 student died by suicide after allegedly being reprimanded by teachers and the principal at a Greater Noida West school for using AI on her mobile phone during pre-Board exams. Her father has filed a police complaint accusing the school of abetment to suicide and mental harassment.

title: Newly Built Ropeway Collapses During Trial In Bihar
content: The incident occurred when the ropeway from Rohtas block to Rohtasgarh Fort and Rohiteshwar Dham gave way along with an attached tower.

title: Are Banks Open Or Closed Today? Check Here
content: The RBI classifies all bank holidays into three main categories - Negotiable Instruments Act holidays, RTGS holidays and bank account closing holidays.

title: BJP-Sena Finalise Seat-Sharing In 200 Wards For BMC Elections: Sources
content: The BJP and Shiv Sena have nearly finalised their seat-sharing arrangements as Mumbai gears up for the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) elections.

title: Raghav Chadha Hosts Blinkit Delivery Rider For Lunch After Viral Low-Pay Clip
content: The meeting took place weeks after Thapliyal Ji posted a video detailing his earnings from a lengthy workday.

title: Justice Through 6th Sense: How Supreme Court Overturned Rape Conviction
content: While considering the bail plea of a man convicted of rape, the Supreme Court stated that it had a "sixth sense" that the accused and the complainant could be brought together again.

title: Delhi Teen Rents Thar, Crashes Into Vehicles As He Panics Seeing Family
content: The boy and his friend immediately tried to flee the scene; however, bystanders chased and stopped them.

title: Big 'Op Aaghat' Crackdown In Delhi, Hundreds Arrested Before New Year
content: Hundreds of accused have been arrested in an overnight crackdown in Delhi as the national capital gears up for New Year celebrations.

title: US Resident Gets Christmas Present, Wins Jackpot Of $1.8 Billion
content: Christmas came early for someone who purchased a Powerball ticket at a gas station outside Little Rock, Arkansas, worth more than $1.8 billion.

title: Over 300 Mumbai Local Trains Cancelled Today, Here's Why
content: Western Railway operates more than 1,400 suburban local trains daily on its network stretching from Churchgate in south Mumbai to Dahanu in Palghar district, over 125 km from the metropolis.

title: Indian-Origin Student Arrested In US For Arson, Terrorist Threat
content: Police responded to Manojh Lella's home after family members reported a mental health episode and alleged threats.

title: Ukraine's Zelensky To Meet Donald Trump On Sunday. Here's What's On Agenda
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky wants to discuss territorial issues, the main stumbling block in talks to end the war, with US President Donald Trump in Florida on Sunday.

title: Why Nigeria Okayed US Strikes On ISIS After Disputing Claim Of Christian Genocide
content: By publicly cooperating with the United States on a Christmas Day airstrike, Nigeria's government may have averted humiliating unilateral military action threatened a month ago by President Donald Trump.

title: CBI Lawyer Killed As Speeding Scorpio Hits His Car On Jammu-Srinagar Highway
content: A video purportedly showing the advocate's car being hit from behind by a speeding vehicle near Banihal went viral on social media.

title: Smog Returns To Delhi As Air Quality Slips Back Into 'Very Poor' Zone
content: Delhi's air quality deteriorated once againy after showing signs of improvement earlier in the week, as several parts of the national capital slipped back into the 'very poor' and 'severe' pollution categories.

title: Minister Says Bihar Liquor Ban Targets Poor, Advises Action Against Mafia
content: Union Minister Manjhi said the real test of the liquor ban will be when action is taken against senior officials who consume alcohol and the liquor mafia.

title: Over 50 Vehicles Involved In Massive Pile-Up In Japan, 1 Dead, 26 Injured
content: A massive crash in snowy weather killed one person and injured 26 on an expressway in Japan late on Friday as the country kicked off its end-of-the-year holiday season.

title: US Air Travel Severely Hit, 1,100 Flights Cancelled, Nearly 4,000 Delayed
content: Airlines canceled more than 1,000 US flights during the peak Christmas travel period on Friday, with severe winter storm warnings and heavy snow forecast across parts of the Midwest and northeast.

title: Powerful Explosions Heard In Kyiv Ahead Of Zelensky's Meeting With Trump
content: Volodymyr Zelensky said he would hold a key meeting with Donald Trump to work out a deal to end nearly four years of the Russia-Ukraine war.

title: Woman raped on agri university campus in Jabalpur; two held
content: The police arrested Durga Shankar Singerha (58), an upper division clerk (UDC), and Mukesh Sen, a peon, in connection with the assault that took place on the campus of the Jawaharlal Nehru Agricultural University.

title: Punjab, Haryana reel under intense cold; Sonamarg coldest at minus 5.8 degrees Celsius
content: Srinagar recorded a minimum temperature of minus 2.6 degrees Celsius on Friday night, nearly three degrees down from 0.2 degrees Celsius on the previous night, they said.

title: Bengal govt officers' association raises concern over voter deletions in draft rolls under SIR
content: The deletions can be made in cases when "the person concerned has ceased to be ordinarily resident in the constituency or that he is otherwise not entitled to be registered in the electoral roll of that constituency", it said

title: CEC begins 3-day Odisha tour, calls BLOs 'pillars of election process'
content: Before concluding his visit, Mr. Kumar will interact with around 700 BLOs from Khurda and Cuttack districts on December 29 in Bhubaneswar

title: Discarded fishing gear piles up on Tamil Nadu coast as recycling infrastructure lags
content: A study shows fishing-related debris such as abandoned or lost nets, ropes, and floats makes up nearly half of the litter found on surveyed beaches

title: Defamatory post: Congress leader in police custody
content: He had already been booked under various sections of the BNS for the defamatory post against Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan

title: Centre's green panel gives nod to Dulhasti hydel power project on Chenab River
content: Expert Appraisal Committee on hydel projects accorded approval during its 45th meeting earlier this month, paving the way for the floating of construction tenders for the run-of-the-river project, estimated to cost over ‚Çπ3,200 crore

title: Tsunami anniversary: T.N. fishermen reiterate demand for Scheduled Tribe status
content: Community leader Durai Mahendran said that without reservation, the community has remained socially and educationally backward, with no IAS officers or judges from among its members

title: Eight militants arrested in Manipur
content: ‚ÄúFour members of the proscribed KCP (People's War Group) were apprehended from Andro Leitanpekpham area in Imphal East district on December 25,‚Äù says senior police officer

title: BJP leader threatens legal action for implicating him in Ankita Bhandari murder case
content: In a video message released by the state BJP on Friday (December 26), Mr. Gautam, the party affairs in-charge for Uttarakhand, claimed that no such allegations were levelled against him in his 47 years of public life.

title: 19 Bangladesh nationals among 511 arrested in Uttarakhand‚Äôs three districts under Operation Kalnemi
content: Those arrested included 19 Bangladeshis illegally residing in the State, of whom 10 have been sent back to the neighbouring country, while action is underway against the other nine, the statement said.

title: Committed to bringing back fugitives who fled India: Govt.
content: The assertion by the Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) came days after Lalit Modi, in a video posted on social media, joked about his and Mallya‚Äôs status as the ‚Äútwo biggest fugitives‚Äù of India

title: IndiGo flight disruptions: Panel submits probe report to DGCA
content: The inquiry committee, headed by DGCA Joint Director General Sanjay K Bramhane, was constituted on December 5 to conduct a comprehensive review and assessment of the circumstances that led to the massive flight disruptions

title: AIADMK extends last date for submission of applications for party ticket to contest poll
content: Two former Ministers C.Ve. Shanmugam and K. Pandiarajan are contemplating changing their constituencies

title: CPI seeks compensation or return of land to farmers in Eluru district
content: Party says 340 acres acquired in 2016 for proposed aircraft components unit remain unused, leaving farming families in financial distress, urges government to act immediately

title: The quiet, deserted meadows of Kashmir
content: Only 28 of the 48 destinations in the Kashmir Valley that were closed after the terror attack in Pahalgam have been reopened. While waiting for the Lieutenant Governor to give clearance to the rest to resume operations, locals who are dependent on tourism for their livelihoods worry about unpaid loans and unsteady jobs. Peerzada Ashiq reports on how the incident continues to impact tourism

title: Rabri Devi may vacate official bungalow after month of Kharmas
content: Videos of pick-up vans full of household belongings making exit from Rabri Devi‚Äôs official bungalow suggest she may vacate it after inauspicious month of Kharmas

title: Students alleges caste discrimination by teachers in Alawalpur village adopted by Ravi Shankar Prasad
content: The Students also alleged that they are forced to do the work which they are not supposed to do like brooming the class, opening the gate, washing their own plates and glasses after mid-day meal and shutting the doors¬†and windows after the classes get over

title: J&K HC court order on PIL related to undertrials surprising, unfortunate: Mehbooba
content: She said the court was the last resort for her ‚Äúto ensure that undertrials who have no serious charges‚Äù are brought back to Kashmir

title: Disintegration talk is rumour-mongering, BJD will survive for generations: Naveen Patnaik
content: The regional party dismisses possible announcement of successor to Mr. Patnaik on its 29th foundation day as mischief

title: Special drive under way to track drunk driving in Kozhikode city
content: SoToxa machines have been made available for the enforcement wings for conducting rapid screening of suspected drivers

title: Chhattisgarh liquor scam: ED files final prosecution complaint
content: Among the new 59 accused are former Deputy Secretary at Chief Minister's office Soumya Chaurasia, former IAS officer Niranjan Das, liquor licence holders, liquor manufacturers and excise department officials

title: Kerala CM slams Karnataka demolitions, calls it ‚Äòbulldozer justice‚Äô
content: As per media reports, a demolition drive at Yelahanka last week pulled down more than 200 houses in Waseem Layout and Fakir Colony

title: Madras High Court grants interim bail to ‚ÄòSavukku‚Äô Shankar in 17 criminal cases
content: Justices S.M. Subramaniam and P. Dhanabal say that repeated curtailment of his personal liberty can only be construed as abuse of process of law

title: After Jabalpur, Christmas celebration disrupted in Indore; mob vandalises decorations
content: The viral video shows two men tearing down a Christmas tree and throwing away decoration items even as many in the mob chanted religious slogans like ‚ÄúJai Siya Ram‚Äù

title: Tripura youth dies after assault over racial slurs in Dehradun
content: While the youth and his brother were buying some household things, a few drunk men started using cast based slurs against the deceased

title: ED dismisses allegations that sand mining survey is illegal
content: The agency submits rejoinder to the charges levelled by the Tamil Nadu government and alleges that the latter has been abetting illegal sand mining or has interests in protecting the practice

title: Toddler dies after falling into water tank near Gudiyatham
content: The family checked the CCTV footage of the house and found that the toddler was walking towards the water tank

title: IIT Madras gears up for Shaastra 2026
content: This year‚Äôs theme, ‚ÄòArtifacts of Arcade‚Äô, reimagines the festival as an interactive, game-like ecosystem where each competition or workshop feels like a new level to conquer

title: Mamata opposing CAA against interest of Bengali Hindus claims BJP; CAA has nothing to do with citizenship retorts TMC
content: The war of words on CAA between the BJP and the TMC have come to the fore when Bangladesh is on the boil and the BJP is raising the issue of attack on Hindus in the neighbouring country

title: West Bengal SIR: Hearings for 32 lakh ‚Äòunmapped‚Äô electors to begin on December 27
content: Hearings to start across 3,234 desks across the State; citizenship certificates obtained under CAA can be submitted for new voter applications, CEO says

title: The Hindu FIC to organise career seminar at KITS, Guntur on December 29
content: Experts will guide students on emerging job opportunities, industry trends and skill development during interactive sessions

title: YSRCP spreading falsehood about Tirumala temple for political gain: TDP leader
content: The coalition government is efficiently managing the unprecedented rush of devotees at Tirumala and other temples, says Vemuri Anand Surya

title: NTR District tops A.P. in ‚ÄòSpeed of Doing‚Äô in governance and service delivery
content: Of the targeted 1,600 MSME registrations in 2025-26 fiscal year, the process have been completed for 1,121, says Minister Satya Kumar Yadav

title: Andhra Pradesh reported 8,200 fatal¬†and¬†10,600¬†non-fatal accidents in 2025
content: Andhra Pradesh registered 17,039 deaths in 2023 due to road accidents when compared to 16,693 deaths in 2022, suggest NCRB data

title: V. Sivankutty inaugurates State-level NSS residential camp
content: Based on the theme ‚ÄòYouth for the Holistic Development of the Village,‚Äô this year‚Äôs camp is envisioned under the title ‚ÄòLife-giving Stream of Human Love that will Continue to Flow‚Äô

title: Government fails to define Aravallis despite over a year‚Äôs effort
content: The Supreme Court‚Äôs threat of contempt proceedings against committee members prodded them into submitting a definition that only protects hills above 100m from mining activities, sparking public outrage

title: Officials suspended over temple construction on govt. land in West Godavari district
content: The construction was carried out on a land belonging to Zilla Parishad, in violation of the directives of High Court, leading to contempt proceedings

title: Call to protect biodiversity-rich underwater ecosystem off Thiruvananthapuram coast
content: Researchers document underwater rocky habitat, between Adimalathura and Poovar, which is rich in fish wealth known to local fishers as ‚ÄòPanthakallu‚Äô

title: CBI moves Supreme Court against bail to Sengar in Unnao rape case; protests continue
content: Sengar‚Äôs petition was vehemently opposed by the CBI and the victim through their counsels in the Delhi HC, say officials; several women sat outside the court holding placards that sought justice for the survivor

title: Ruhullah warns of protest over reservation issue in J&K
content: Disagreements surface within National Conference as MP signals street action over open merit concerns

title: Irradiation centre near Hyderabad airport will help fruit farmers cut down damage and transportation cost
content: Agriculture department is planning to provide facilities with a cold chain capacity of 50 lakh tonnes and an additional warehousing capacity of 50 lakh metric tonnes, Agriculture Secretary said

title: Sabarimala all set for Mandala puja on Saturday
content: Ceremonial procession carrying the Thanka Anki reached the Sannidhanam on Friday evening ahead of the Mandala puja

title: Nitin Nabin attends Assam BJP executive meet, says NDA will safeguard citizens‚Äô rights
content: BJP leader asserts firm stand on infiltration, calls on party workers to strengthen alliance ahead of 2026 State elections

content: At the finale of the party‚Äôs centenary year celebration, he appealed for the reunification of the communist movement in the country

title: Farmer dies of heart attack during land acquisition meeting in Amaravati
content: Ramarao was rushed to a hospital in a government vehicle after he collapsed on a chair, but died on the way

title: Kerala launches new campaign for good health
content: A rally was flagged off from Kasaragod on December 26 as part of the campaign promotion. It is expected to reach Thiruvananthapuram on January 1 when it will be launched formally

title: Full-body advertisements on buses fetch BMTC ‚Çπ57.5 crore a year; ‚Çπ230 crore eyed over next four years
content: As part of a renewed push to augment earnings through alternative revenue streams, BMTC, beginning January this year, introduced full-body advertisement wraps on 3,400 of its buses

title: End attacks on Hindus, Suvendu tells Bangladesh Deputy High Commission
content: Will continue protests outside the commission if attacks don‚Äôt stop, BJP leader-led delegation tells officials

title: JD (S) will contest local bodies elections independently, says HDD
content: The alliance with BJP will continue for Lok Sabha and Legislative Assembly polls, the former Prime Minister says

title: New Mayor V.K. Minimol vows crackdown on corruption, focus on mobility
content: The new Mayor of the Kochi Corporation outlines her priorities and vision for the city, which she says are aligned with the broader agenda of the UDF and will be reflected in the maiden budget to be presented by the new governing committee in the coming months.

title: Church body seeks action against those attacking Christians
content: Rev. Asir Ebenezer, general secretary, National Council of Churches in India says the Prime Minister‚Äôs visit, particularly at a time when attacks on Christians are reported from various places in the country, is perceived as a reassuring signal to the community

title: O. Sadasivan is new Mayor of Kozhikode
content: S. Jayasree of the CPI(M) is the new deputy mayor;  the whole council will work together for the development of the city, says new Mayor

title: ‚ÄòPressed by authorities‚Äô, Mirwaiz drops Hurriyat chairman title from X bio
content: Umar Farooq‚Äôs decision draws a range of reactions from political leaders in Kashmir; Mehbooba Mufti says Hurriyat was ‚Äúan idea and represented the alienation felt by people‚Äù

title: Prashant Jagtap joins Congress after quitting Sharad Pawar-led NCP faction

title: Crime in the garb of politics will not be tolerated, warns Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister Chandrababu Naidu
content: The government will also not tolerate those resorting to character assassination of political opponents through abusive posts, he asserts, and calls upon parties to maintain decency and decorum expected in a political system

title: Development, not controversy, our focus: Thrissur DCC president
content: Joseph Tajet says Congress candidates received support even from councillors who were earlier fellow travellers of the Left, underscoring that development-oriented politics prevailed over allegations and disputes

title: New Mayors, municipal chairpersons take charge in Kerala
content: V.V. Rajesh takes over as the first BJP Mayor of the Thiruvananthapuram Corporation, four United Democratic Front Mayors, three of them women, take oath in Kollam, Kochi, Thrissur, and Kannur Corporations. The lone LDF Mayor, O. Sadasivan, sworn in as Mayor of the Kozhikode Corporation

title: India condemns 'hostility' against Bangladesh minorities
content: ministry of external affairs condemns recent killing of a Hindu youth in mymensingh . the acrimonious exchanges between India and Bangladesh came to a head on friday . govt said it should be seen in the context of the call for efforts to ensure free, fair and inclusive parliamentary polls in Bangladesh .
